attributes.action: Scrap the council tax in favour of efficient centralised taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council Tax is unfair. It is based on fictitious wealth - house values inflated by an unscrupulous and unregulated housing market.
Council Tax is very expensive - requiring whole departments in local authorities to manage and collect.
Council Tax is based on the false idea that everyone should pay, which contravenes the principal of taxation by affordability.
Save local government costs. Scrap the council tax and increase income tax with a premium that can be allocated to the area where you live.
